mean_cn: v.【医】给……接种，给……注射预防针，【植】嫁接，灌输
mean_en: to give (a person or animal) a weakened form of a disease in order to prevent infection by the disease
sentence: This injection will inoculate you against polio.
sentence_trans: 这个注射剂可以让你预防小儿麻痹症。
word_etyma: in 向内，进入 + ocul 眼睛 + ate [名词后缀] → inoculate[医] 接种
